mapper.select: select x.rnum, x.* from ( select rownum as rnum, p.* from ( select c.sensor_sn, c.model_name, c.sensor_kind, c.manufacturer, c.voltage, c.create_day, c.vertical, c.site_id, s.site_name from (select DISTINCT my_sensor.sensor_sn, my_sensor.model_name, my_sensor.sensor_kind, my_sensor.manufacturer, my_sensor.voltage, substr(my_sensor.create_day,0,14) as create_day,my_sensor.vertical,install_sensor.site_id from my_sensor FULL OUTER JOIN install_sensor on my_sensor.sensor_sn = install_sensor.sensor_sn) c LEFT OUTER JOIN site s on c.site_id = s.site_id order by create_day desc ) p where rownum < #{endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{startnum} order by x.create_day desc

select x.rnum, x.* from ( select rownum as rnum, p.* from ( select c.sensor_sn, c.model_name, c.sensor_kind, c.manufacturer, c.voltage, c.create_day, c.vertical, c.site_id, s.site_name from (select my_sensor.sensor_sn, my_sensor.model_name, my_sensor.sensor_kind, my_sensor.manufacturer, my_sensor.voltage, substr(my_sensor.create_day,0,14) as create_day, my_sensor.vertical,install_sensor.site_id from my_sensor FULL OUTER JOIN install_sensor on my_sensor.sensor_sn = install_sensor.sensor_sn where ${Search.searchType} LIKE '%' || '${Search.keyword}' || '%') c LEFT OUTER JOIN site s on c.site_id = s.site_id order by create_day desc ) p where rownum < #{Paging.endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{Paging.startnum} order by x.create_day desc
select a.sensor_sn, a.sensor_kind, a.vertical from my_sensor a minus select b.sensor_sn, a.sensor_kind, a.vertical from my_sensor a ,install_sensor b where a.sensor_sn = b.sensor_sn
mapper.insert: insert into install_sensor (sensor_id, sensor_sn, site_id, program_var, upper_limit, lower_limit) values(sensor_seq.nextval, #{sensor_sn}, #{site_id}, #{program_var},#{upper_limit},#{lower_limit})
